Discount

We appreciate a lot your long-term relationship with us.
The more people you add to your team and the longer you stay with us, the more you get in return.

The Loyalty Discount table below shows how your savings add up depending on the number of consecutive years you have been with us and the number of employees you hire for your remote team.

 

 

The more people you have and the longer you are with us the bigger your discount.
